thumbnail.caption: CrowdStrike Holdings, Inc. (CRWD): I Sold Some For My Trust, Says Jim Cramer

headline: Veza Partners with CrowdStrike to Deliver End-to-End Access Security and Identity Threat Protection to Stop the #1 Attack Vector: Compromised Identity
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., September 11, 2025--Veza, the pioneer in identity security, today announced new enhancements to its integration with CrowdStrike® (NASDAQ: CRWD), a leader in cloud-delivered endpoint and identity protection. The enhanced Veza + CrowdStrike integration gives security teams unified visibility into identities, access entitlements, and device posture, enabling them to proactively reduce breach risk, automate threat hunting, and accelerate threat response.

content.title: Veza Partners with CrowdStrike to Deliver End-to-End Access Security and Identity Threat Protection to Stop the #1 Attack Vector: Compromised Identity

The enhanced Veza + CrowdStrike integration gives security teams unified visibility into identities, access entitlements, and device posture, enabling them to proactively reduce breach risk, automate threat hunting, and accelerate threat response.

headline: ColorTokens Announces Integration with the CrowdStrike Falcon Platform
summary: ColorTokens today announced the integration of its Xshield Enterprise Microsegmentation Platform™ with the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform. Now available on the CrowdStrike Marketplace, the integration enables customers to accelerate Zero Trust adoption by leveraging CrowdStrike Falcon Firewall Management to deliver microsegmentation without the need to deploy additional agents.
